price: 64. Hubaal (arrin)kani waa xaq aan shaki lahayn - waa doodda ehlu Naarka.
arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقّٞ تَخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna dhālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahli al-nāri
